channel.title: Role/Class/Whatever: Necromancer
channel.description:
Necromancer
Neutral Killing
Passive: Undead: Immune to death at night
Day Ability: Deadly Magic: The next player you kill will appear as "Necromancer". 2 Uses
Day Ability: Death's Whisper: Death will be whispered into the target's ear. This is publicly announced. They will die at night unless someone visits them, where a random visitor will die instead and you'll gain another use of this ability. 1 Use
Night Ability: Dark Explosion: Cause a player to die. Bypasses occupation.
Night Ability: Reanimation: Use a night Ability of the player you most recently killed.

item.title: Role/Class/Whatever: Necromancer
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Undead is a DK passive. Try Deathless maybe?

Who would find you as Necromancer? Death’s whisper is just an extra kill. Dark Explosion standard kill. Reanimation is only useful in edge cases. Usually better to just kill.

Read full topic
